law.catch_line: This subtitle does not apply to: ...
law.text:
This subtitle does not apply to:
the sale or offering for sale of cigarettes, newspapers, magazines, paper cups, paper or cloth towels, soap, toilet seat covers, postage stamps, or sanitary napkins; or
the sale or offering for sale of merchandise through a bulk vending machine as defined in § 11-201.1 of the Tax - General Article.
